text: Kamrej assembly constituency (કામરેજ વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Surat district. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Kamrej Taluka # Choryasi Taluka (Part) Villages – Saroli, Saniya Hemad, Simada, Sarthana, Puna, Magob. ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 354 || 196733 || 159194 || 0 || 355927 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2007 - Bharatiben Rathod, Bharatiya Janata Party *2012 - Prafulbhai Pansheriya, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - V.D Zalavadiya, Bharatiya Janta Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Surat district
title: Kamrej (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
